mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the Benefit Show for Bill Phillips featuring stars of the Grand Ole Opry with Porter Wagoner, The Kitty Wells Family Show with Johnny and Bobby Wright, Johnny Russell, Little Jimmy Dickens, Jim Ed Brown, Norma Jean, and Jett Williams and The Drifting Cowboys at the Texas Troubadour Theatre on May 21. Poster features metal photoplates of Porter Wagoner, The Kitty Wells Family Show, Johnny Russell, Little Jimmy Dickens, Jim Ed Brown, Norma Jean, and Jett Williams and The Drifting Cowboys.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
